root.name: Project Gotham Racing 2
root.description: Project Gotham Racing 2 is a racing game for the Xbox and is the highly anticipated sequel to Project Gotham Racing from Bizarre Creations and Microsoft. It is the first game in the series to have online multiplayer for 8 players via Xbox Live.Project Gotham Racing 2 is a game which encourages a combination of speed and style, which is represented through its Kudos points system where elaborate moves such as overtaking, drifting and power sliding will award players Kudos points which will advance their ranking and will allow the purchase of new cars. The game launched with races in exotic locations throughout the world from Barcelona to the famous motorsport track, Nürburgring. Game TypesKudos World SeriesPlayers must compete in a series of races throughout the world in 14 categories beginning from the Compact Sport class and ending with the Ultimate class. The objective is to finish races in the top positions to win medals. Depending on difficulty level, players can achieve steel to platinum medals. Kudos World Series' modes include street races, one on one, cone challenges, hot lap, timed runs, overtake and speed camera.Arcade RacingThere are 60 races and the game will provide you with the track, car and game mode. The races are evenly split by 20 street racing, timed runs and cone challenges events.Time AttackThe player must complete the course as fast as possible. The player can choose their car, city and race track though they must first be unlocked from Kudos World Series.
